message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with learning bilingual sentence embeddings and sentence alignment recovery. It also involves the use of neural machine translation and autoencoding, which are common techniques in natural language processing. 

It could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it involves training a multilayer perceptron on top of the sentence embeddings to extract good bilingual sentence pairs. 

Additionally, it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves the use of machine learning techniques to learn bilingual sentence embeddings. 

It could also belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) as the concept of embeddings is commonly used in computer vision tasks such as image recognition. 

Finally, it could belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as it involves the use of neural networks to learn bilingual sentence embeddings.
